channel.title: log poisoning on Christian.V
channel.description: Recent content in log poisoning on Christian.V

item.title: brute
item.description: Recon : a quick ping to verify the target is up. the target is up, will run a quick rust scan on the target to find open ports. 4 open ports, 21,22,80,3306 will run nmap scan to identify the services and versions running on those ports. the results shows FTP, SSH AND HTTP and MYSQL and their respective versions. Enumeration: Started enumeration with the ftp server, will attempt to login with an anonymous user.
